catList: Brands are among the most important intangible assets a company can have. A strong brand is a powerful means to differentiate products or services and it can have a great impact on consumer buying decision. This course is designed to provide the students with a fundamental understanding of how to build and manage brands.  After taking this course, you should: 1) know key issues in building effective brand strategies, 2) have a sound theoretical basis to make better branding decisions, and 3) have some experience in the applications of theory (via cases, class discussions, etc.).

This course is designed to provide the students with a fundamental understanding of how to build and manage brands. Within this context, key issues in building effective brand strategies will be covered, providing students with a sound theoretical basis to make better branding decisions. The applications of theory (via cases, class discussions, etc.) will be stressed.
